oai_dc:dc.dc:title: ADAR: Crop husbandry
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Crop husbandry
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The aim of this part of the program (1 project) is to develop low input farming routes with varietal innovations sown in ultra low density. The experiments are made on low input straw cereal productions in organic and conventional farming.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: { Programme part} ADAR: Crop husbandry. Runs 2005 - 2007. Programme Leader(s): Haefliger, Max.
